taskDescription:
A student raised 10 to a power and the result was <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mn>0.00001</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">0.00001</annotation></semantics></math>. What was the power?
